Description: Fragment of Fikellura painted neck-amphora. Hind leg of hare; crescents.
Findspot: Found/Acquired: Tell Dafana, "Qasr", east annex (G), chamber 29 (probably)
Curator's comments: According to the Register, 12 fragments registered under the number 1888,0208.53 were kept in a bag marked 'all one vase, 29'. Most, or possibly all, of the 14 fragments today registered under this number were thus found in the Qasr, chamber 29.
Bibliographic references: CVA British Museum 8 / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum: Great Britain 13, British Museum 8 (Pl. GB 575, 11.)
Weber 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus anderen ägyptischen Fundorten (TD 200)
Leclère and Spencer 2014 / Tell Dafana Reconsidered: The Archaeology of an Egyptian Frontier Town (p.211)
